original_title: 娘の絶倫彼氏に避妊の方法を1回教えるつもりが…コンドームの箱が空になるまでハメまくってナマ中出しまでしちゃったワタシ…
overview: Riho, A Mother Who Was Worried That Her Daughter's Boyfriend, Who Wants To Fuck, Didn't Wear Condoms During Sex... When She Handed A Box Of Condoms While Her Daughter Was Absent, She Said, "Tell Me How To Do It." For that reason, I taught him how to have sex with a rubber. She was going to teach me one contraceptive method, but... I'm addicted to a young and hard cock! Riho returns to being a woman every time she fucks her... Until her condom box is empty, she has sex over and over again and ends up with a raw vaginal cum shot...!
title: I Only Planned To Do It One Time To Teach Him About Contraception… But The Box Was Out Of Condom’s, So I Wound Up Taking A Creampie From My Daughter’s Hung Boyfriend Riho Fujimori
